item.title: Report X-2024041469
item.description:
Report X-2024041469

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-01T15:11:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-25
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS LEAKING NON-REGULATED WINDOW CLEANER. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 10 OUNCE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CAN OF WIZARD HAWAIIAN RETREAT ODOR NEUTRALIZER AIR FRESHENER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
